title: 103_s2277
content: Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out the major medical facility projects and leases for which funds are requested in the FY 1995 budget of the Department of Veterans Affairs. Authorizes additional major medical facility projects, in specified amounts, as well as projects for which funds were appropriated under the Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Act of 1994. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1995 for such projects and leases, with specified limitations. Authorizes the Secretary to undertake an administrative reorganization at the Department Medical Center in Sepulveda, California, as necessitated by the January 1994 earthquake there, without regard to a congressional waiting period requirement.
